verses.verse: Moreover David<WH1732> and the captains<WH8269> of the army<WH6635> separated<WH914> to the service<WH5656> of the sons<WH1121> of Asaph<WH623>, and of Heman<WH1968>, and of Jeduthun<WH3038>, who should prophesy<WH5012> with harps<WH3658>, with psalteries<WH5035>, and with cymbals<WH4700>: and the number<WH4557> of the workmen<WH582> according to their service was<WH5656>:

Of the sons<WH1121> of Asaph<WH623>; Zaccur<WH2139>, and Joseph<WH3130>, and Nethaniah<WH5418>, and Asarelah<WH841>, the sons<WH1121> of Asaph<WH623> under the hands<WH3027> of Asaph<WH623>, which prophesied<WH5012> according to the order<WH3027> of the king<WH4428>.

Of Jeduthun<WH3038>: the sons<WH1121> of Jeduthun<WH3038>; Gedaliah<WH1436>, and Zeri<WH6874>, and Jeshaiah<WH3470>, Hashabiah<WH2811>, and Mattithiah<WH4993>, six<WH8337>, under the hands<WH3027> of their father<WH1> Jeduthun<WH3038>, who prophesied<WH5012> with a harp<WH3658>, to give thanks<WH3034> and to praise<WH1984> the Lord<WH3068>.

Of Heman<WH1968>: the sons<WH1121> of Heman<WH1968>; Bukkiah<WH1232>, Mattaniah<WH4983>, Uzziel<WH5816>, Shebuel<WH7619>, and Jerimoth<WH3406>, Hananiah<WH2608>, Hanani<WH2607>, Eliathah<WH448>, Giddalti<WH1437>, and Romamti<WH7320>–ezer, Joshbekashah<WH3436>, Mallothi<WH4413>, Hothir<WH1956>, and Mahazioth<WH4238>:

All these were the sons<WH1121> of Heman<WH1968> the king<WH4428>'s seer<WH2374> in the words<WH1697> of God<WH430>, to lift up<WH7311> the horn<WH7161>. And God<WH430> gave<WH5414> to Heman<WH1968> fourteen<WH702> sons<WH1121> and three<WH7969> daughters<WH1323>.

All these were under the hands<WH3027> of their father<WH1> for song<WH7892> in the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068>, with cymbals<WH4700>, psalteries<WH5035>, and harps<WH3658>, for the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of God<WH430>, according to the king<WH4428>'s order<WH3027> to Asaph<WH623>, Jeduthun<WH3038>, and Heman<WH1968>.

So the number<WH4557> of them<WH251>, with their brothers that were instructed<WH3925> in the songs<WH7892> of the Lord<WH3068>, even all that were skillful<WH995>, was two hundred<WH3967> eighty<WH8084> and eight<WH8083>.
And they cast<WH5307> lots<WH1486>, custody<WH4931> against<WH5980> custody<WH6996>, as well the small as the great<WH1419>, the teacher<WH995> as the scholar<WH8527>.
Now the first<WH7223> lot<WH1486> came forth<WH3318> for Asaph<WH623> to Joseph<WH3130>: the second<WH8145> to Gedaliah<WH1436>, who with his brothers<WH251> and sons<WH1121> were twelve<WH8147>:
The third<WH7992> to Zaccur<WH2139>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The fourth<WH7243> to Izri<WH3339>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The fifth<WH2549> to Nethaniah<WH5418>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The sixth<WH8345> to Bukkiah<WH1232>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The seventh<WH7637> to Jesharelah<WH3480>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The eighth<WH8066> to Jeshaiah<WH3470>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The ninth<WH8671> to Mattaniah<WH4983>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The tenth<WH6224> to Shimei<WH8096>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The eleventh<WH6249> to Azareel<WH5832>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The twelfth<WH8147> to Hashabiah<WH2811>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The thirteenth<WH7969> to Shubael<WH7619>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The fourteenth<WH702> to Mattithiah<WH4993>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The fifteenth<WH2568> to Jeremoth<WH3406>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The sixteenth<WH8337> to Hananiah<WH2608>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The seventeenth<WH7651> to Joshbekashah<WH3436>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The eighteenth<WH8083> to Hanani<WH2607>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The nineteenth<WH8672> to Mallothi<WH4413>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The twentieth<WH6242> to Eliathah<WH448>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The one<WH259> and twentieth<WH6242> to Hothir<WH1956>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The two<WH8147> and twentieth<WH6242> to Giddalti<WH1437>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The three<WH7969> and twentieth<WH6242> to Mahazioth<WH4238>, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>:
The four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> to Romamti<WH7320>–ezer, he<WH1121>, his sons, and his brothers<WH251>, were twelve<WH8147>.
